note:
curious, progressive, wide variety of interests. Love the planet, but I'm often not all that thrilled about humans. I write sporadically.

Live on unceded Tiwa homelands

I'm happy to have new followers, but I only want real ones. If you have a brand new account, please fill out your bio a bit...and welcome to Mastodon.... I won't approve blank accounts.

Also, I am incapable of seeing typos until after I post, so I edit my posts often...... sorrrry about that!
